verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> called <WH7121> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> and spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> him out of the tabernacle <WH4480> <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, If <WH3588> any man <WH120> of <WH4480> you bring <WH7126> an offering <WH7133> unto the LORD, <WH3068> ye shall bring <WH7126> <WH853> your offering <WH7133> of <WH4480> the cattle, <WH929> even of <WH4480> the herd, <WH1241> and of <WH4480> the flock. <WH6629>

If <WH518> his offering <WH7133> be a burnt sacrifice <WH5930> of <WH4480> the herd, <WH1241> let him offer <WH7126> a male <WH2145> without blemish: <WH8549> he shall offer <WH7126> it of his own voluntary will <WH7522> at <WH413> the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>
And he shall put <WH5564> his hand <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of the burnt offering; <WH5930> and it shall be accepted <WH7521> for him to make atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> him.

And he shall kill <WH7819> <WH853> the bullock <WH1121> <WH1241> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and the priests, <WH3548> Aaron's <WH175> sons, <WH1121> shall bring <WH7126> <WH853> the blood, <WH1818> and sprinkle <WH2236> <WH853> the blood <WH1818> round about <WH5439> upon <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> that <WH834> is by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>
And he shall flay <WH6584> <WH853> the burnt offering, <WH5930> and cut <WH5408> it into his pieces. <WH5409>

And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> shall put <WH5414> fire <WH784> upon <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and lay the wood in order <WH6186> <WH6086> upon <WH5921> the fire: <WH784>

And the priests, <WH3548> Aaron's <WH175> sons, <WH1121> shall lay <WH6186> <WH853> the parts, <WH5409> <WH853> the head, <WH7218> and the fat, <WH6309> in order upon <WH5921> the wood <WH6086> that <WH834> is on <WH5921> the fire <WH784> which <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the altar: <WH4196>

But his inwards <WH7130> and his legs <WH3767> shall he wash <WH7364> in water: <WH4325> and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH853> all <WH3605> on the altar, <WH4196> to be a burnt sacrifice, <WH5930> an offering made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And if <WH518> his offering <WH7133> be of <WH4480> the flocks, <WH6629> namely, of <WH4480> the sheep, <WH3775> or <WH176> of <WH4480> the goats, <WH5795> for a burnt sacrifice; <WH5930> he shall bring <WH7126> it a male <WH2145> without blemish. <WH8549>

And he shall kill <WH7819> it on <WH5921> the side <WH3409> of the altar <WH4196> northward <WH6828> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and the priests, <WH3548> Aaron's <WH175> sons, <WH1121> shall sprinkle <WH2236> <WH853> his blood <WH1818> round about <WH5439> upon <WH5921> the altar. <WH4196>

And he shall cut <WH5408> it into his pieces, <WH5409> with <WH854> his head <WH7218> and his fat: <WH6309> and the priest <WH3548> shall lay them in order <WH6186> <WH853> on <WH5921> the wood <WH6086> that <WH834> is on <WH5921> the fire <WH784> which <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the altar: <WH4196>

But he shall wash <WH7364> the inwards <WH7130> and the legs <WH3767> with water: <WH4325> and the priest <WH3548> shall bring <WH7126> it <WH853> all, <WH3605> and burn <WH6999> it upon the altar: <WH4196> it <WH1931> is a burnt sacrifice, <WH5930> an offering made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And if <WH518> the burnt sacrifice <WH5930> for his offering <WH7133> to the LORD <WH3068> be of <WH4480> fowls, <WH5775> then he shall bring <WH7126> <WH853> his offering <WH7133> of <WH4480> turtledoves, <WH8449> or <WH176> of <WH4480> young <WH1121> pigeons. <WH3123>

And the priest <WH3548> shall bring <WH7126> it unto <WH413> the altar, <WH4196> and wring off <WH4454> <WH853> his head, <WH7218> and burn <WH6999> it on the altar; <WH4196> and the blood <WH1818> thereof shall be wrung out <WH4680> at <WH5921> the side <WH7023> of the altar: <WH4196>

And he shall pluck away <WH5493> <WH853> his crop <WH4760> with his feathers, <WH5133> and cast <WH7993> it beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196> on the east part, <WH6924> by <WH413> the place <WH4725> of the ashes: <WH1880>

And he shall cleave <WH8156> it with the wings <WH3671> thereof, but shall not <WH3808> divide it asunder: <WH914> and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> it upon the altar, <WH4196> upon <WH5921> the wood <WH6086> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the fire: <WH784> it <WH1931> is a burnt sacrifice, <WH5930> an offering made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
